Description
Uncut, re-mastered and restored version of the Bruce Lee classic (the only full length feature ever directed by him). Set in Modern Rome, it is the story of how a country boy outsmarts the big-city gangsters. Includes the complete Colosseum fight between Lee and karate legend Chuck Norris (complete with nunchakus)
